name: MUDA
description:
MUDA Was made for the game makers toolkit 48 hour game jam!

This is A fighting game without an attack button!

The objective of the game is to hit your opponent out of the playing area!

this is a two player game so grab a friend and have some fun! 

---- handleyshelton.com

https://www.patreon.com/Indieo
